scenario_text.value: Oh, good morning Takuma.
Morning.

Saki seems pretty upset, though I guess
I feel the same way.

What did you make of those ghostly hands
yesterday, Takuma?

They were horrifying. My legs were shaking so
bad I couldn’t even move.
Oh...so they scared you too.

But you know, I thought it was kinda cool how
you went to save Ryo like that.

Well, I never could’ve done it if it weren’t
for Kunemon.

And anyway, I was pretty desperate to save
Ryo.

So...you don’t actually hate the guy? Despite
his bad attitude?

It’s not really about whether I hate him or
not. Besides, even Ryo has his good points.
Haha, I’m joking! Ryo’s one of us, after all.

Heheh, you sure are nice, though. Even Ryo
has his good points, huh?

I...don’t feel like I was being especially
nice. Besides, Ryo does have his good points.
You’re right. I think so too.

One night just isn’t enough to put something
like that behind you, is it?

Yeah. I’m still pretty upset about the whole
thing, too.

(We all watched as one of us disappeared. The
shock of that moment was unbelievable.)

Ryo was a pretty twisted guy. He was always
really grumpy, insulting, and uncooperative.
But that doesn’t make it okay that he’s gone.

Besides, I knew what his real problem was. He
never knew how to express himself.

I guess that side of him kinda reminded me of
myself. That’s why I stuck by him.

(I never understood why Saki, who’s so
cheerful and outgoing, was always with Ryo.)

(But I think I get it now. She must’ve felt
like they were two sides of the same coin.)
(Not that I could ever see it.)

He was always so lonely. That’s why he acted
the way he did.

That’s right. People can be like that, can’t
they?
You could see it too, Floramon?
Nope, not at all.
What?!

But I know that you’re really nice, Saki!
I know that better than anyone.
Nice...huh?
Is that what you think too, Takuma?

(Saki seems nice enough to me, but she can be
pretty blunt sometimes.)

(Besides, I feel like I still don’t know her
all that well.)
(How should I answer Saki?)
I think you’re nice.
I think you’re blunt.
I couldn’t say.
Yeah, I’m sure you’re nice enough.

Hey! What kind of non-answer is that? I’ll
have you know that Saki is very nice!
Yeah, sure, but...I don’t know.
I feel like there’s more to it than that.
Huh? What’s that supposed to mean?

Well, I’m not sure how best to say it. Like,
you clearly understand Ryo really well.

It’s like you said before. You may not come
out and say it, but you care about people.
Huh... So that’s how you feel about me?
I’m...kinda happy about that. Thanks, Takuma.
What? Oh, sure.

Ooh, Takuma, your face is turning red! You
feeling shy? Maybe a little nervous?
No! Why would I be nervous?
I think you’re very honest, Saki.

You’re always so blunt about what’s on your
mind.

I...feel like that doesn’t answer my
question.

You’re right, it doesn’t. That sounds like
a deflection to me.

(Actually, it does kind of sound like that,
doesn’t it?)
So...I guess I do come off like that.
Huh?
It’s nothing. Never mind.
To be honest, I’m not really sure.
What? You mean you don’t think she’s nice?

No, I didn’t mean it like that. It’s just
that we only recently got to know each other.

So I don’t think it would be honest of me to
agree when I don’t know Saki all that well.

Is that your way of saying you want to get to
know me better?
Maybe... I guess.
Okay. That...actually doesn’t sound too bad.

(I’m not sure I get what just happened,
but...Saki seems satisfied.)

You know, I think talking with you helped
make me feel a little better. Thanks, Takuma.

I was feeling pretty down, but talking with
you helped lift my spirits.
Thanks.
